author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
What materials has Adam Savage had bad experiences with? Is Adam working on an OG Alien flashlight? Does Adam have a favorite build using magnets? What's the most dangerous tool in Adam's shop? In this live stream excerpt Adam answers these questions from Xalo White, gimmebuilds, Sunshyn and Brian Baker, whom we thank for their support! What materials do you not like to work with? 

00:00 Injuries galore
04:30 Alien flashlight
05:45 Magnets, bitches
09:24 Adam's most dangerous tool

What Adam Savage's New Bandsaw Can Finally Cut: https://youtu.be/IoTN5s-YFI4
Anne Pauley: https://www.annepauley.com/
